DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy add-on therapy repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( rTMS ) venlafaxine treatment major depressive disorder compare venlafaxine ( optimal medication ) rTMS .
DOC.brief_title: Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Venlafaxine Depression
DOC.detailed_description: rTMS parameter : Intensity 120 % individually determine motor threshold ; frequency : 1 Hz ; 360 impulsion ; period : 1 min ; period : 30 .
DOC.criteria: Adults Clinical diagnosis major depressive disorder ( DSMIV ) HDRS17 item > 20 Failure one antidepressant treatment ( efficacious dose 6 week least ) I II bipolar disorder Psychotic feature Failure one previous venlafaxine treatment Addiction comorbidity schizophrenia comorbidity Involuntary hospitalization Seizures history Pregnancy breastfeed Somatic comorbidity able impact cognitive function
